title: ADVISORY Vice President Biden To Hold Middle Class Task Force Roundtable Discussion with Small Business Owners and Employees on Rising Costs of Health Care | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




July 08, 2009

 



ADVISORY Vice President Biden To Hold Middle Class Task Force Roundtable Discussion with Small Business Owners and Employees on Rising Costs of Health Care




      THE WHITE HOUSE Office of the Vice President   -------------------------------------  FOR PLANNING PURPOSES             July 8, 2009  **MEDIA ADVISORY** Vice President Biden To Hold Middle Class Task Force Roundtable Discussion with Small Business Owners and Employees on Rising Costs of Health Care WASHINGTON – On Friday, July 10, at 11:00 AM EDT, Vice President Biden, Secretary Sebelius and Director of the White House Office of Health Reform Nancy-Ann DeParle, along with several small business employers and employees from around the country, will hold a roundtable discussion on the rising costs of health care for people who work in small businesses and small business employers, and the impact those high costs have on middle-class families across America.  This event is pooled for TV and open to print and still photographers.  **Watch this event live at 11:00 AM EDT at obamawhitehouse.archives.gov/live and  www.healthreform.gov ** WHAT:                      Vice President Joe Biden, HHS Secretary Sebelius                                   and Director of the White House Office of Health Reform Nancy-Ann DeParle                                   to hold a roundtable discussion on rising costs of health care WHO:                       Vice President Joe Biden                                      Health and Human Services Secretary Kathleen Sebelius                                      White House Office of Health Reform Director Nancy-Ann DeParle                                      Small-business employers and employees WHEN:                      Friday, July 10, at 11:00 AM                                      (Gather time is at 10:30 AM at the White House Stakeout location)     WHERE:                     Eisenhower Executive Office Building, Room 350                                                           RSVP:                             Print reporters and photographers wishing to cover who do not have a hard pass should RSVP with their Date of Birth and Social Security Number to press@ovp.eop.gov by no later than 5:00 PM EDT on Thursday, July 9.   ###
